content.rendered:
Headache Rack & Cargo Rack

 

  • Adjustable in width & height to fit every truck on the market
  • Optional addition of an adjustable tailgate rack
  • Tailgate rack can be slid off of rail assembly or moved up against the headache rack
  • Made from lightweight, aircraft-grade aluminum that is extremely strong
  • All hardware is stainless steel, not zinc plated steel
  • All components are rust and maintenance free

Additional photos of our Headache Rack and Cargo Rack Systems
